name: 2-amino-3,7-dideoxy-D-threo-hept-6-ulosonate:NAD+ oxidoreductase (deaminating)
definition: 2-Amino-3,7-dideoxy-D-threo-hept-6-ulosonic acid + H2O + NAD+ <=> 3-Dehydroquinate + Ammonia + NADH + H+
comment: two-step reaction (oxidative deamination, cyclization) possibly intermediate (3,7-dideoxy-D-threo-hept-2,6-diulosonic acid)
